title: Magical Sanrio Christmas Wanderland for families
blurb: Step into a magical Sanrio Christmas Wanderland with loved ones.
description: Step into the magical Sanrio Christmas Wanderland at Marina Square's central atrium, a festive wonderland where dreams come true with beloved Sanrio characters. This attraction offers a picture-perfect setting for families and children. Enjoy delightful snowfall at the Let It Snow Magical Rink, perfect for capturing photos with Sanrio friends and a pink Christmas Tree. Kids can also enjoy the Kiddo Roll & Bowl Magical Rink, bowling with jumbo pins and scoring sweet treats. Unleash creativity at the Christmas Art Station, personalizing holiday greeting cards with Sanrio charm and collecting free character stickers. Participate in the Instagram Photo Contest for a chance to win Marina Square eVouchers. Don't miss the special Meet and Greet sessions with Hello Kitty and Pompompurin, featuring a surprise appearance by Gudetama, creating cherished memories up-close. This family-friendly destination is packed with interactive fun and opportunities to create lasting holiday memories, making it an ideal festive outing for all ages seeking a joyful Christmas experience.
datetime_display: 23 Nov 2023 – 1 Jan 2024. Specific activity timings vary, see description for details.

title: Christmas Wanderland with Sanrio Characters
blurb: Experience a magical Wanderland with Sanrio characters this Christmas.
description: Gather your loved ones and step into a world of alluring experiences where dreams come true with Sanrio characters this Christmas season! Feel the Christmas spirit in the air as you step into a picture-perfect magical Wanderland with Hello Kitty, Cinnamoroll, Pompompurin, My Melody, Kuromi and Little Twin Stars at the central atrium. Enjoy magical moments in the Wanderland with activities and score sweet treats and Sanrio characters gifts. Let It Snow Magical Rink, 23 Nov – 31 Dec 2023 Daily: 2pm, 7.30pm & 8.30pm Enjoy the delightful snowfall at the Christmas Wanderland surrounded by Sanrio characters and the mesmerizing pink Christmas Tree. Capture the best shot with Cinnamoroll while you bask in the snow showers at the rink! Limited standing capacity at the magical rink, on a first-come-first-served basis. This family-friendly event offers a unique opportunity for children and adults alike to immerse themselves in a festive atmosphere, creating cherished memories with beloved characters. Don't miss out on the chance to explore this enchanting world and partake in the joyous celebrations.

title: Kiztopia Marina Square: Massive Indoor Play Fun
blurb: Massive indoor playground with 18 zones for kids.
description: Kiztopia Marina Square is a massive indoor playground spanning 18,000 square feet, offering 18 different play zones for children aged 12 months to 12 years old. Kids can enjoy giant slides, thrilling obstacle courses, a huge ball pit, an exciting trampoline park, and a dedicated toddler play area designed for younger guests. This vibrant and engaging space provides endless opportunities for active play, exploration, and social interaction. Parents can comfortably relax at the on-site cafe, enjoying refreshments while their children have a fantastic time. It's the perfect destination for families seeking a fun-filled day out, promoting physical activity and imaginative play in a safe and stimulating environment. Ideal for birthday parties and family gatherings, Kiztopia ensures a memorable experience for everyone.

title: Pororo Park Singapore: Penguin-Themed Indoor Fun
blurb: Penguin-themed indoor playground with train rides, shows.
description: Pororo Park Singapore is an enchanting 11,000 sq ft indoor playground, bringing the beloved Korean animated series, Pororo the Little Penguin, to life. This vibrant park offers a delightful array of attractions, including an exciting train ride, a massive ball pit for endless fun, a soft play area designed for safe exploration, and a dedicated stage for daily character meet-and-greets and captivating performances. It's a perfect destination for children aged 1 to 9 years old, providing an immersive and interactive experience. Kids can meet their favourite characters, engage in imaginative play, and enjoy various activities in a colourful and stimulating environment. Pororo Park Singapore promises a memorable and joyful outing for families, combining entertainment with active play.

title: NERF Action Xperience: Indoor Battle Arena Fun
blurb: Indoor arena for NERF battles, obstacle courses, target practice.
description: NERF Action Xperience is an exhilarating 18,000 sq ft indoor arena, meticulously designed for participants of all ages seeking adventure and active fun. This dynamic venue features multiple thrilling zones dedicated to intense NERF battles, challenging obstacle courses that test agility and strength, and precision target practice areas to hone your skills. It's a fantastic environment that actively promotes active play, strategic thinking, and essential teamwork among friends and family. Whether you're a seasoned NERF enthusiast or new to the game, the Xperience offers a unique and engaging outing. Perfect for family bonding, group events, or simply a day of high-energy entertainment, NERF Action Xperience guarantees an unforgettable adventure for everyone involved, fostering friendly competition and memorable moments.
datetime_display: Weekdays: 12 PM to 8 PM; Weekends: 10 AM to 9 PM
